DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether dextromethorphan ( Neurodex ) quinidine effective treatment pain diabetic neuropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Dextromethorphan Quinidine Treatment Pain Diabetic Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis diabetes mellitus Established diabetic therapy least 3 month Labsupported diagnosis painful diabetic distal symmetric sensory/motor polyneuropathy Pain previous three month Not pregnant Patient fail adequate trial 3 medication require narcotic pain History torsades de pointes Sensitivity quinidine opiate drug ( codeine , etc ) Severe pain could confound assessment Patient amputation Patient participate past 30 day currently participate another trial Patient previously receive treatment dextromethorphan quinidine
